categories.title: Bastien Faisant
categories.description: Computer engineer graduated from ESIR, in Rennes, I am looking for a permanent contract as a Full Stack developer from September 2024. Passionate about web and software development, I am ready to bring my skills and my dynamism to a innovative team.

entities.title: Full Stack Web developer (Internship)
entities.description: Recruitment management web application in Angular, API in NodeJS with the NestJS framework and database hosted in PostgreSQL.

entities.title: Frontend Web developer (Internship)
entities.description:
The aim of my internship with Flyx Cloud was to develop a frontend solution for a white-label order management web application for retail companies.
At the end of my internship, the proposed product presents the overall flow of an order management system, from the display of the store menu to the online payment of the basket.

entities.title: Creation of a domain-specific language to define robot behaviour
entities.description: Modelling and implementation of the domain with Ecore. Creation of the grammar with Langium (in TypeScript). Development of an interpreter for a Web simulator and a compiler for Arduino code.

entities.title: Client-Server micro-services architecture with the LwM2M communication protocol
entities.description: Analysis of the protocol and creation of a Client-Server implementation using the Eclipse Leshan Java library. Backend in Java Spring Boot and web interface in Vue.js.

entities.title: Implementation of a distributed game on a Client-Server model in Java RMI
entities.description: Server developed using the Spring framework and Spring Remoting RMI technology.

entities.title: Generating captions for food images (Image Captioning)
entities.description: Training of a model on a data set, developed in Python with the TensorFlow and PyTorch machine learning libraries and fine-tuned with a model of pre-trained transformers from the Hugging Face Transformers library.

entities.title: React web solution for white-label order management
entities.description: Front-end web application in React with the Next.js framework. Interaction with the backend developed in .NET.

entities.title: Evaluation of young football players in data engineering
entities.description: Data retrieval via web scraping (BeautifulSoup and Selenium WebDriver) and Pandas and Numpy for processing.

entities.title: Peer-to-peer mobile gaming application
entities.description: Flutter application for single and multiplayer challenges over Wi-Fi P2P.

entities.title: Dockerized microservices of an association manager
entities.description: Architecture using NestJS, MySQL, Angular, Quarkus, RabbitMQ and Nginx.

entities.title: Development of a compiler for new programming language While in C++
entities.description: Compiler using ANTLR and Java to create a grammar lexer and parser, three-address code and runtime library for C++.

entities.title: Flutter web application for managing training schedules
entities.description: Frontend web application in Flutter/Dart, API in NodeJS with the NestJS framework and database hosted in MongoDB.

entities.title: Mobile application for signposting and cleaning up illegal dumping
entities.description: Android development in Java/XML with Android Studio and Visual Studio Code tools. Hosting of our database in Firebase.

entities.school: ESIR - Rennes Graduate School of Engineering
entities.degree: Fifth-year student in a Master's program

entities.school: ESIR - Rennes Graduate School of Engineering
